CatDescriptText: Montell Rudolph, 2469 Waring Court, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 23, 1958, pg. A1 with question: "In the coming November elections, do you think voters should elect another Democratic Governor or change to a Republican?" answer reads: "I'm Democratic and believe strictly in Democratic ticket. Therefore, I believe that there should be another Democrat."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Montell Rudolph wearing hat and light colored shirt, holding box that reads "15 DOZ Hotel Special ARMOUR" standing on sidewalk of street with automobiles and buildings in background
